Posts.EditableText: ... I thought I'd better do it - as it's 2pm here now... I've opened my best pressie for the day - waiting until my sister get's in to open the rest. How are you all doing people? Just a link to an MP3 song I think is spectacular: http://kazza.id.au/mt-archives/files/DearNola.mp3

Posts.EditableText: I'm doing quite nicely, and wish everyone else a great christmas. I'm on vacation visiting my parents. I came with around $1000, and now I'm broke I spent around $300 on gifts for my close friends. I guess this is as good a time as any to note that I'll be returning to the forums from my more-or-less unannounced absence. How's everyone else this holiday season?
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText: Woot, slayer's back. Merry Boxing day everyone, as it is now... Funny how tron posted this at 2am and here at 2am I see it... Meh. I didn't get many presires and got well told off for not getting anybody anything, but to fair they didn't ask for anything, I've never have to buy presents before, and I have no money...

Posts.EditableText: When I was a little kid, I loved Xmas. I'm just glad it's over now. I miss my mom, even if she wasn't perfect.
